rows.label: qst201004_msg0001
rows.name:
Two Blades... Yes, that corroborates
what we've heard.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0002
rows.name:
How much does the Department
of Safety know?

rows.label: qst201004_msg1001
rows.name:
Honestly, not a lot. We know their
names are Mikumari and Seori, and
that's about it.

rows.label: qst201004_msg2001
rows.name:
We're on a manhunt for them and
their Drivers, but we don't have much
to go on.

rows.label: qst201004_msg3001
rows.name:
So far, no one's even seen what
they look like.

rows.label: qst201004_msg3002
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201004_msg4001
rows.name:
I've heard there are similar incidents
happening in other countries. Might
they be related, do you think?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0003
rows.name: It's highly probable.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0004
rows.name:
We've had similar disturbances in
Gula lately, and those two Blades
were sighted there too.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0005
rows.name:
The problem is, we've lost so many
of our men to them already...

rows.label: qst201004_msg0006
rows.name:
If you've already got the military on
the case, can't you just send out
a bigger party to get them?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm afraid the capital's standing army
aren't going to mobilize just for two
rogue Blades.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0009
rows.name:
Having said that, the Department of
Safety don't have the capacity to deal
with large-scale operations like this.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0012
rows.name:
But we can't just let them run
rampant.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0013
rows.name:
If we were to try and apprehend these
criminals, would you assist us?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0014
rows.name: You would help us?!

rows.label: qst201004_msg0015
rows.name:
But of course! Having the Special
Inquisitor's assistance in this matter
would be most reassuring!

rows.label: qst201004_msg0016
rows.name:
That's all well and good, but how
exactly are we supposed to
catch them?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0017
rows.name:
So what now? We go wandering
about town carrying Core Crystals
around in plain sight?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0018
rows.name:
They're being cautious now, but
parade a hundred Crystals under their
noses and I bet that'll change.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0019
rows.name:
Yeah, but we probably shouldn't
expect to go up against those two
and come out of this unscathed.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0020
rows.name:
Oh, there's no reason we should play
ourselves straight into their hands.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0021
rows.name: What's your plan, Meleph?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0022
rows.name:
Rather than waiting for them to appear,
we should lure them into a situation
that will be advantageous for us.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0024
rows.name:
With the Department of Safety on our
side, we should be able to assemble
a decent number of troops.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0025
rows.name:
We'll divide their attention between us
and a second unit. Keeping them apart
will minimize casualties.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0027
rows.name:
How will we get them to split up,
though?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0028
rows.name: By spreading rumors.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0029
rows.name: Rumors?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0030
rows.name:
We'll spread rumors that two deals
involving smuggled Core Crystals are
going down in two separate locations.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0031
rows.name:
If we circulate this in secret to enough
merchants in the area...

rows.label: qst201004_msg0032
rows.name: Then the culprits will take the bait!

rows.label: qst201004_msg0033
rows.name:
We can use the Merc Group to
spread the rumors without our
enemies catching on.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0034
rows.name:
It'll still be pretty tough dealing with
one of them alone.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0035
rows.name:
I know we'll be fine, but will the
others be able to handle them?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0036
rows.name:
Those not versed enough in battle can
be supported by the Merc Group when
we set our plan into motion.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0037
rows.name:
Would the Department of Safety be
Okay with this?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0038
rows.name: Indeed! We're fully on board with you.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0039
rows.name:
We'll start organizing a capture
squad immediately.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0040
rows.name:
Good. Then let's commence the
operation!
